description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if X's Grok AI bans a majority of eligible, subscribed users in the United States from generating images of Donald Trump by August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes", Grok must refuse explicit requests to generate an image of Donald Trump.

If Grok explicitly states that it is not permitted to generate an image of Trump when asked, this market will resolve to "Yes", even if users are able to bypass this block through different commands.

If image generation in general by Grok is disabled within this market's timeframe, it will immediately resolve to "Yes". 

Periods of downtime will not count toward a "Yes" resolution to this market - this market will only resolve to "Yes" if Grok explicitly stops image generation broadly or stops generating images of Trump.

The primary resolution source for this market is Grok and official information from X, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

markets.question: Grok bans image generation of Trump in August?

title: Grok bans image generation of Trump in August?
